name: MasterIOT
0:
”Alexa, close water valve”
”Alexa, what is the temperature of my solar heater?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your home like never before with Master IOT. Now you can measure and control your water level sensors, gas, electricity, solar heater, valves and more, all with voice commands thanks to Alexa! Download our app today and discover how easy it is to have a smart home.
Here is a step-by-step guide to set up Master IOT with Alexa:
1. Download the Master IOT app from Google Play or the iOS App Store.
2. Open the app and create a new account or log in if you already have one.
3. Turn on the Master IOT devices and connect them with the Master IOT app.
4. It is important to rename the devices in the Master IOT app. For example, if you rename a smart bulb as "Living Room Light", Alexa will learn the new name after searching for devices in step 8.
5. Download the Amazon Alexa app from Google Play or the iOS App Store, and connect your Echo with the Alexa app.
6. Search for Master IOT in the Alexa skills store.
7. Enable the Master IOT skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking.
8. Say "Alexa, discover my devices." Wait until Alexa confirms that it has found the devices.
The setup is complete! Test your devices using Echo.
Here are some voice commands you can use with Master IOT:
“Alexa, what is the water level in my tank?"
"Alexa, how much gas is left in my tank?"
"Alexa, what is the noise level in the room?"
"Alexa, close gas valve" 
"Alexa, close water valve" 
"Alexa, what is the temperature of my solar heater?" 
"Alexa, is the room smoke level safe?"
Find out all the voice commands for your Master IOT devices at www.master.com.mx and enjoy a truly smart home.
